column1: Smoque BBQ////tried the pulled pork sandwich the other day. thought the meat was pretty tasty but when i happened to take a peak at their bottled bbq sauces they had for sale
column2: both the original and the spicy flavors had high fructose corn syrup and anyone who knows anything about bbq is even at a high volume place such as Smoque
column3: its a no no in terms of taste compared to regular sugar. so that was a picky turn off for me.
